metadata.title: Mapped Sea Surface Parameters from Nimbus-7 SMMR (Martix-SS)

creators.name: Space Administration (NASA), Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC)

metadata.description: To report on the Matrix-SS data set consists of several mapped parameters derived from the Map-SS data set (NSSDC ID 78-098A-08F).  This data set includes a series of color film products providing maps of six-day and monthly averages of sea ice surface temperatures, sea ice concentration (percent of ice cover within the field of view).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To report on the Matrix-SS data set consists of several mapped parameters derived from the Map-SS data set (NSSDC ID 78-098A-08F).  This data set includes a series of color film products providing maps of six-day and monthly averages of sea ice surface temperatures, sea ice concentration (percent of ice cover within the field of view).
